property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: U.S. service member saying goodbye to an Afghan governor

note.text: Ending a meeting and taking leave can take a long time. Plan to spend 10 to 20 minutes at the end of each meeting taking leave. You will be offered a final cup of tea, even if the meeting hasn't been enjoyable.
Take leave in the same way you greeted. Shake hands or place your hand over your heart. Say thank you and goodbye to elders and officials first, then to all the remaining parties.
